meanings.definition: A framework for holding and storing items
meanings.sent1: The metal rack in the garage keeps our tools organized.
meanings.sent2: She placed the books neatly on the wooden rack.
meanings.sent3: The rack in the pantry decided it wanted to be a shelf instead.
meanings.sent4: The rack of shelves in the store reached towards the ceiling.
meanings.sent5: The rack in the kitchen displayed a colorful array of spices.

meanings.definition: To cause extreme pain or suffering
meanings.sent1: The loud noise can rack your ears if you're not careful.
meanings.sent2: The guilt of his actions began to rack his conscience.
meanings.sent3: The spicy food threatened to rack his taste buds with heat.
meanings.sent4: The suspense of the movie continued to rack her nerves.
meanings.sent5: The loss of her pet would rack her heart with sorrow.

meanings.definition: A pair of antlers on a male deer
meanings.sent1: The majestic deer proudly displayed its impressive rack.
meanings.sent2: The hunter admired the size of the buck's rack.
meanings.sent3: The deer with the large rack seemed to be showing off.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight glinted off the deer's rack in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The rack of antlers on the deer was a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: She had to rack her brain to remember where she left her keys.
meanings.sent2: The athlete needed to rack his muscles before the race.
meanings.sent3: Trying to remember the answer made him rack his brain.
meanings.sent4: The tightrope walker had to rack her balance to stay upright.
meanings.sent5: He had to rack his memory to recall the details of the story.

meanings.definition: A piece of equipment used for cooking or drying food
meanings.sent1: The baker placed the dough in the oven rack to bake.
meanings.sent2: She used the drying rack to hang the freshly washed clothes.
meanings.sent3: The spice rack in the kitchen decided to take a vacation.
meanings.sent4: The cooling rack allowed the cookies to cool evenly.
meanings.sent5: The rack in the kitchen held various pots and pans for cooking.
